00034     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     Image::Image()
00036         : m_pBuffer( NULL )
00037     {
00038     }
00039 
00040     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041     Image::Image( const Image &img )
00042     {
00043         // call assignment operator
00044         *this = img;
00045     }
00046 
00047     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048     Image::~Image()
00049     {
00050         if( m_pBuffer )
00051         {
00052             delete[] m_pBuffer;
00053             m_pBuffer = NULL;
00054         }
00055     }
00056 
00057     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058     Image & Image::operator = ( const Image &img )
00059     {
00060         m_uWidth = img.m_uWidth;
00061         m_uHeight = img.m_uHeight;
00062         m_eFormat = img.m_eFormat;
00063         m_ucPixelSize = img.m_ucPixelSize;
00064 
00065         m_pBuffer = new uchar[ m_uWidth * m_uHeight * m_ucPixelSize ];
00066         memcpy( m_pBuffer, img.m_pBuffer, m_uWidth * m_uHeight * m_ucPixelSize );
00067 
00068         return *this;
00069     }
00070 
00071     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     Image & Image::flipAroundY()
00073     {
00074         OgreGuard( "Image::flipAroundX" );
00075         OgreUnguardRet( *this );
00076     }
00077 
00078     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079     Image & Image::flipAroundX()
00080     {
00081         OgreGuard( "Image::flipAroundX" );
00082 
00083         if( !m_pBuffer )
00084         {
00085             Except( 
00086                 Exception::ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR,
00087                 "Can not flip an unitialized texture",
00088                 "Image::flipAroundX" );
00089         }
00090         
00091         size_t rowSpan = m_uWidth * m_ucPixelSize;
00092         
00093         uchar *pTempBuffer = new uchar[ rowSpan * m_uHeight ];
00094         uchar *ptr1 = m_pBuffer, *ptr2 = pTempBuffer + ( ( m_uHeight - 1 ) * rowSpan );
00095 
00096         for( ushort i = 0; i < m_uHeight; i++ )
00097         {
00098             memcpy( ptr2, ptr1, rowSpan );
00099             ptr1 += rowSpan; ptr2 -= rowSpan;
00100         }
00101 
00102         memcpy( m_pBuffer, pTempBuffer, rowSpan * m_uHeight);
00103 
00104         OgreUnguardRet( *this );
00105     }
00106 
00107     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108     Image & Image::loadRawData(
00109         const DataChunk &pData,
00110         ushort uWidth, ushort uHeight,
00111         PixelFormat eFormat )
00112     {
00113         OgreGuard( "Image::loadRawData" );
00114 
00115         m_uWidth = uWidth;
00116         m_uHeight = uHeight;
00117         m_eFormat = eFormat;
00118         m_ucPixelSize = PF2PS( m_eFormat );
00119 
00120         m_pBuffer = new uchar[ uWidth * uHeight * m_ucPixelSize ];
00121         memcpy( m_pBuffer, pData.getPtr(), uWidth * uHeight * m_ucPixelSize );
00122 
00123         OgreUnguardRet( *this );
00124     }
00125 
00126     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127     Image & Image::load( const String& strFileName )
00128     {
00129         OgreGuard( "Image::load" );
00130 
00131         if( m_pBuffer )
00132         {
00133             delete[] m_pBuffer;
00134             m_pBuffer = NULL;
00135         }
00136 
00137         String strExt;
00138 
00139         size_t pos = strFileName.find_last_of(".");
00140         if( pos == String::npos )
00141             Except(
00142             Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00143             "Unable to load image file '" + strFileName + "' - invalid extension.",
00144             "Image::load" );
00145 
00146         while( pos != strFileName.length() - 1 )
00147             strExt += strFileName[++pos];
00148 
00149         Codec * pCodec = Codec::getColl()[ strExt.toLowerCase() ];
00150         if( !pCodec )
00151             Except(
00152             Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00153             "Unable to load image file '" + strFileName + "' - invalid extension.",
00154             "Image::load" );
00155 
00156         SDDataChunk encoded;
00157         DataChunk decoded;
00158 
00159         if( !ArchiveManager::getSingleton()._findResourceData( 
00160             strFileName, 
00161             encoded ) )
00162         {
00163             Except(
00164             Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00165             "Unable to find image file '" + strFileName + "'.",
00166             "Image::load" );
00167         }
00168 
00169         ImageCodec::ImageData * pData = static_cast< ImageCodec::ImageData * > (
00170             pCodec->decode( encoded, &decoded ) );
00171 
00172         // Get the format and compute the pixel size
00173         m_uWidth = pData->ulWidth;
00174         m_uHeight = pData->ulHeight;
00175         m_eFormat = pData->eFormat;
00176         m_ucPixelSize = PF2PS( m_eFormat );
00177 
00178         delete pData;
00179 
00180         m_pBuffer = decoded.getPtr();
00181         
00182         OgreUnguardRet( *this );
00183     }
00184 
00185     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00186     Image & Image::load( const DataChunk& chunk, const String& type )
00187     {
00188         OgreGuard( "Image::load" );
00189 
00190         String strType = type;
00191 
00192         Codec * pCodec = Codec::getColl()[ strType.toLowerCase() ];
00193         if( !pCodec )
00194             Except(
00195             Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00196             "Unable to load image - invalid extension.",
00197             "Image::load" );
00198 
00199         DataChunk decoded;
00200 
00201         ImageCodec::ImageData * pData = static_cast< ImageCodec::ImageData * >(
00202             pCodec->decode( chunk, &decoded ) );
00203 
00204         m_uWidth = pData->ulWidth;
00205         m_uHeight = pData->ulHeight;
00206         
00207         // Get the format and compute the pixel size
00208         m_eFormat = pData->eFormat;
00209         m_ucPixelSize = PF2PS( m_eFormat );
00210 
00211         delete pData;
00212 
00213         m_pBuffer = decoded.getPtr();
00214 
00215         OgreUnguardRet( *this );
00216     }
00217 
00218     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00219     uchar* Image::getData()
00220     {
00221         return m_pBuffer;
00222     }
00223 
00224     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00225     const uchar* Image::getConstData() const
00226     {
00227         assert( m_pBuffer );
00228         return m_pBuffer;
00229     }
00230 
00231     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00232     size_t Image::getSize() const
00233     {
00234         return m_uWidth * m_uHeight * m_ucPixelSize;
00235     }
00236 
00237     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00238     ushort Image::getWidth() const
00239     {
00240         return m_uWidth;
00241     }
00242 
00243     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00244     ushort Image::getHeight() const
00245     {
00246         return m_uHeight;
00247     }
00248 
00249     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00250     ushort Image::getRowSpan() const
00251     {
00252         return m_uWidth * m_ucPixelSize;
00253     }
00254 
00255     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00256     Image::PixelFormat Image::getFormat() const
00257     {
00258         return m_eFormat;
00259     }
